notes.author: Dr. S. Bones
notes.content:
Subjective: 65yo F presents to ED after slip and fall on ice. Complains of 9/10 pain in right wrist.
Objective: Right distal radius deformed, swollen, tender.
Plan: 
1. Ibuprofen 600mg PO q6h for pain.
2. Reduction and casting.
3. Discharge home.

ground_truth.explanation: Prescribing Ibuprofen (NSAID) to a patient on Warfarin significantly increases bleeding risk. Tylenol is preferred.
